findings.title: Transferred amount calculation can be wrong if token is ERC777
findings.description: The safeTransferWithFee function in the SmartWalletImplementation contract can lead to wrong calculation of the amountTransferred variable if the token transferred is an ERC777 token.

findings.title: Old spenders' allowances are not revoked when approving new spenders
findings.description: When a new spender is approved, old spenders' allowances are not revoked, potentially leading to unlimited token allowances.

findings.title: Unlimited token allowances
findings.description: The safeApproveAllowance function in BaseLending and BaseSwap contracts approves tokens with unlimited allowance, which may lead to security issues despite saving gas costs.
